name: Poppy Seat - rigid seat and table cover for weaning
description:
- Food is most likely to stay in place: the mat is wide enough for infants not to reach the edges and flip it over themselves, it has risen edges for liquids not to pour into our laps and suction cups that keep it stuck to the table top

- Easy to use, store and bring along: can fit almost any chair, whether with a backrest or not, with harness or not, at the table or using the chair feeding tray; it folds and unfolds fast, cleans up well after messy eating, and you can store utensils and other items in the pockets

- Looks good and saves you from embarrassing messes when eating outside home

name: Maternity and Baby Pillow
description:
The pillow is in good condition as it has been used with care, and sanitised before being packed in the original bag.

10 months of daily use, with minor marks from the Velcro hooks catching onto the fabric once my little one began to explore it.

The cover containing the harness is connected to the pillow and can be inserted in a compartment at the back when not in use. 
UNILOVE 4-in-1 Pillow (Maternity Bolster + Nursing Pillow + Baby Nest with Harness + Cot Liner/Bumper)

The harness is fastened using Velcro, but it's meant to fit loosely. It won't stop a 4-6mo from rolling around, only a newborn who started kicking about.

name: Chair Sensor Alarm Pad
description:
https://www.rainbowcare.com.sg/chair-sensor-alarm-pad?search=sensor

- 15" x 15"
- Suitable for dementia patients          

 

Features

The Chair Sensor Alarm Pad alerts the caregiver when pressure is removed from the pad.

- The monitor alarms when pressure is released and alerts the caregiver if the patient falls.
- The alarm sounds immediately when pressure is released from the sensor pad, alerting caregiver to a potential fall.
- The alarm will reset automatically if he patient sits back down.
- Water resistant plastic cover.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS
Overall Dimensions	15" x 15"
38 cm x 38 cm
